      • triNormalize

        public static org.bukkit.util.Vector triNormalize(org.bukkit.util.Vector direction)
        (clone) Force normalize the vector into three points, 1, 0, or -1. If the value is > 0.333 (1) if the value is less than -0.333 (-1) else 0
        Parameters:
        direction - the direction
        Returns:
        the vector
